title: ICE: Encountered error `Unimplemented` selecting `Binder(<[i32; 1000] as std::clone::Clone>)` during trans

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```rust
fn test<T: Copy>(x: T) { x.clone(); }
fn main() { test([0; 1000]); }
```
